data.headline: Junior Product Manager
data.narrative: Ananya Sharma, a recent graduate from the prestigious Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi, has embarked on her journey as a Junior Product Manager. With a strong academic background in Computer Science and a keen interest in innovation, she is eager to apply her analytical skills and problem-solving abilities to drive product success. During her time at IIT, Ananya was actively involved in various research projects, honing her ability to identify user needs and develop effective solutions. She is now excited to leverage her technical expertise and passion for product development to contribute to the growth of a dynamic organization.
